Reference

High-level helpers

You should mostly need these ones

Momit

Momit

sniff()

Find files

digest()

Digest tibbles and vector content

review()

Review files

Importers

From the jungle of format to R

export_yaml() import_yaml()

yaml wrappers

import_txt()

Import coordinates from .txt files

Lower level friends

Image

additional image_* on top of magick

is_image() image_rasterize2D() image_mask() image_explode() image_center()

Add helpers for working with image-magick

Strings

additional str_* helpers on top of stringr

str_remove_useless_spaces() str_underscorise() str_trim_ext() str_trim_dirpath() str_split_on() str_to_mat() str_drop() str_to_named_list()

String helpers

Path

string helpers targetted on paths

extract_dir() extract_ext() extract_file()

Extract information from paths

list_files() is_imagepath()

List files in path

Algorithms

They do their best

algo_Conte()

Extract outline coordinates from a mask raster

Helpers for example raw data

Some messy paths
